default.title: An Error Occurred
default.description: The website experienced a problem. Please try again later or contact Carnegie.

400.title: Bad Request
400.description: The website couldn't understand your request. Make sure you typed everything correctly and try again.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.description: You need to login to access this part of the website.

403.title: Forbidden
403.description: You don't have permission to access this part of the website. Please contact Carnegie if you think this is a mistake.

404.title: Not found
404.description: The requested page is currently unavailable.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.description: The website is experiencing a problem, and it isn't your fault. Please try again later or contact Carnegie.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.description: The website is currently too busy or under maintenance. Please try again later.

504.title: Gateway Timeout
504.description: The website is taking too long to respond. This could be due to high traffic or technical issues. Please try again later.
